text: What do you know about the relationship between the dependent and independent variable from a rising graph? A level graph? A falling graph?

Answers will vary. Student responses might include:

  • A “rising” graph means that as the independent variable is increasing, the dependent variable is increasing.
  • A level graph means the dependent variable is not changing even as the independent one is.
  • A “falling” graph means the dependent variable is decreasing as the independent variable is increasing.
